name: Just Another Sandbox Game
description:
Just a small simulation I made.

Click to place elements, and choose them from the buttons:
Dark blue - void
Yellow - sand (default)
Light blue - water
Red - fire
Brown - wood
Green - some kind of plant (tap recomended)
Orange - lava
Gray - some sort of stone
Black - destruction
Upper white - hold (default) / tap
Other white - pause / unpause
